Buruh Minta KHL 78 Item, Pengusaha: 60 Aja Cukup
03 Nov 2019, 11:54 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Konfederasi Serikat Pekerja Indonesia (KSPI) meminta kenaikan upah minimum provinsi (UMP) dihitung bukan berdasarkan angka inflasi dan pertumbuhan ekonomi seperti sekarang, melainkan berdasarkan kebutuhan hidup layak (KHL).Saat ini sendiri, komponen KHL berjumlah 60 item. Sedangkan pihaknya mengusulkan KHL ditambah menjadi 78 item.Menanggapi itu, Ketua Umum DPD HIPPI DKI Jakarta Sarman Simanjorang mengatakan, 60 item KHL yang ada saat ini sudah cukup. Sehingga tidak perlu ditambah. "Sebenarnya yang 60 itu saja sudah cukup. Kita pengusaha bukannya tidak suka, tapi menurut pendapat kami apakah item-item seperti itu perlu harus dimasukkan semuanya?," tanya Sarman saat dihubungi detikcom, Minggu (3/11/2019).Saat diminta tanggapan terkait daftar item KHL, Sarman meminta agar hal-hal dalam skala kecil tidak perlu dimasukkan dalam daftar KHL. Menurutnya, hal itu dapat membuat Indonesia dipandang kurang bagus oleh investor."Saya rasa di luar negeri nggak ada loh seperti itu. Sampai deodorant, minyak rambut, sisir, haduh kayak gimana gitu. Itu kan buat negara kita jadi kurang bagus juga. Udahlah nggak perlu dibeberkan satu-satu," minta Sarman.Menurutnya, UMP merupakan upah untuk orang yang memiliki 0-1 tahun pengalaman dan masih bujangan. Sehingga, dengan UMP 2020 DKI Jakarta yang mencapai Rp 4.276.349, itu sudah cukup layak."Apalagi di Jakarta ada kartu pekerja yang dibuat pak Anies Baswedan. Di sana ada subsidi pangan, transportasi, pendidikan, kesehatan, apalagi gitu loh?," kata Sarman.Simak Video "Aksi Mahasiswa-Buruh di Patung Kuda Usai, Massa Bubar Teratur"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Workers Ask for KHL 78 Items, Employers: Just 60 Enough
03 Nov 2019, 11:54 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - The Confederation of Indonesian Trade Unions (KSPI) requested an increase in the provincial minimum wage (UMP) calculated not based on inflation rates and economic growth as it is now, but based on the necessities of decent living (KHL). At present itself, the KHL component amounts to 60 items. While his party proposed that the KHL be added to 78 items. Responding to that, Chairman of DKI Jakarta DPD HIPPI Sarman Simanjorang said, 60 existing KHL items were sufficient. So it does not need to be added. "Actually, that 60 alone is enough. We entrepreneurs do not like it, but in our opinion whether items like that need to be included all of them," Sarman asked when contacted by AFP on Sunday (11/03/2019). When asked for a response Regarding the list of KHL items, Sarman requested that things on a small scale need not be included in the KHL list. According to him, it can make Indonesia considered less good by investors. "I think there is no such thing abroad. Up to deodorant, hair oil, combs, like that. That's right for our country to be less good too. need to be explained one by one, "Sarman asked. According to him, the UMP is a wage for people who have 0-1 years of experience and are still single. So, with DKI Jakarta 2020 UMP reaching Rp 4,276,349, it is already quite feasible. "Moreover, in Jakarta there is an employee card made by Anies Baswedan. There are food, transportation, education, health subsidies, what else?" said Sarman.
